title: How long is a piece of string (preview for an interactive work)
creator_credit: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM) and Judith Graham
brief_description: as part of the end of year screening for the Swinburne, EDIM (Electronic Design and Interactive Media) course - those students who had completed interactive coursework were required to create a linear representation of their work for the showreel. This student should be contacted and asked to submit the full work to the Interactive collection
